letter.subject: Change password request
letter.content:
Hello,We received a request to change the password for your account.
If you made this request, click the button below to set a new password:Change passwordFor your security, this link will expire in {passcode_expiry}
If you didnâ€™t request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email â€” your password will stay the same.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your username and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
